template.name: Custom Fields Example1
template.template_md:
# Agents > There needs to be an Agent custom fields named: **Agent Test Field** and **Agent Test Field 2** {% for item in data_sources.agents %} {% endfor %}
Hostname Test Field 1 Test Field 2
{{ item.hostname }} {{ item.custom_fields.AgentTestField }} {{ item.custom_fields["Agent Test Field 2"] }}
# Clients > There needs to be an Client custom fields named: **Client Test Field** and **Client Test Field 2** {% for item in data_sources.clients %} {% endfor %}
Name Test Field 1 Test Field 2
{{ item.name }} {{ item.custom_fields.ClientTestField }} {{ item.custom_fields["Client Test Field 2"] }}
# Sites > There needs to be an Site custom fields named: **Site Test Field** and **Site Test Field 2** {% for item in data_sources.sites %} {% endfor %}
Name Test Field 1 Test Field 2
{{ item.name }} {{ item.custom_fields.SiteTestField }} {{ item.custom_fields["Site Test Field 2"] }}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agents:
    custom_fields:
    - AgentTestField
    - Agent Test Field 2
    limit: 50
    model: agent
    only:
    - hostname
  clients:
    custom_fields:
    - ClientTestField
    - Client Test Field 2
    limit: 50
    model: client
    only:
    - name
  sites:
    custom_fields:
    - SiteTestField
    - Site Test Field 2
    limit: 50
    model: site
    only:
    - name
